nodes.documentation: @title Vesting trustee contract for IPS token.
nodes.name: IPSVestingTrustee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor that initializes the address of the IPsSmartToken contract.
 @param _token IPSSmartToken The address of the previously deployed IPsSmartToken smart contract.
nodes.name: IPSVestingTrustee
grant

nodes.documentation:
@dev Revoke the grant of tokens of a specifed address.
 @param _holder The address which will have its tokens revoked.
nodes.name: revoke
vestedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculate amount of vested tokens at a specifc time.
 @param _grant Grant The vesting grant.
 @param _time uint256 The time to be checked
 @return An uint256 representing the amount of vested tokens of a specific grant.
   |                         _/--------   vestedTokens rect
   |                       _/
   |                     _/
   |                   _/
   |                 _/
   |                /
   |              .|
   |            .  |
   |          .    |
   |        .      |
   |      .        |
   |    .          |
   +===+===========+---------+----------> time
     Start       Cliff      End
nodes.name: calculateVestedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Unlock vested tokens and transfer them to their holder.
 @return a uint256 representing the amount of vested tokens transferred to their holder.
nodes.name: unlockVestedTokens
